content: A large area has a sloping path leading up to the right, with several plants to harvest including Aged Ginseng, Fragrant Jade Flowers, and a Lingzhiling in disguise.

A large area has a sloping path leading up to the right, with several plants to harvest including Aged Ginseng, Fragrant Jade Flowers, and a Lingzhiling in disguise.
